page.title: 01A General Picture
page.content: The area surveyed can be split into two particular types of use. The majority of land is wooded and meadow, the left most parts of the area is residential and also has several shopping areas. The main shopping area is Sevenoaks High Street and there are also more shops at the top and bottom of St. John's Hill area. Two main roads travel through the area. One is the A225 which runs through to Dartford, the other is the A25 which takes traffic from the Bat and Ball traffic lights through to Seal and eventually merges with the A20. Knole House is situated on the south side of the survey area and has a large acreage of ground known as Knole Park. Another feature of the park is the deer for which it is famous.
